code: import{format}from'date-fns';var cn=function cn(){for(var _len=arguments.length,args=new Array(_len),_key=0;_key<_len;_key++){args[_key]=arguments[_key];}return args.join(' ');};var formatDate=function formatDate(date){return format(new Date(date),'MM/dd/yyyy h:mm:ss');};var numberToCurrencyString=function numberToCurrencyString(number){return number.toLocaleString('en-US');};var clamp=function clamp(current,min,max){return Math.min(Math.max(current,min),max);};export{cn,formatDate,numberToCurrencyString,clamp};
